        public MatchView​(GameView game,
                 Player active,
                 Player viewer,
                 int actionsNumber,
                 GamePhase phase,
                 boolean useFrenzy,
                 Player firstFrenzy)
        Instances a new MatchView object with current parameters
        Parameters:
        game - Active game
        active - Active player
        viewer - Player who calls the view method
        actionsNumber - Number of remaining actions for the currently active player
        phase - Game phase
        useFrenzy - true in case of Frenzy turn, false otherwise
        firstFrenzy - First Frenzy player
